document_data.name: Keltormir
document_data.mainbody: '''Keltormir''' was a [[moon elf|moon]] and [[green elf]] realm established circa {{Yearlink|-17800}} to avoid the strife of the other [[elf|elven]] nations..
document_data.Geography: The forests of the realm encompassed the areas known later as [[Amn]], [[Tethyr]], [[Erlkazar]], and [[Calimshan]].
document_data.History:
[[Giant]]s came to the forests of Keltormir and [[Shantel Othreier]], seeking to establish their own realm and started felling trees in large numbers. The elves learned that this would provoke the [[dragon]]s in the region into attacking the giants, but they wanted their lives to stay peaceful, so took a neutral stance. The dragons did indeed attack the giants. In {{Yearlink|-11700}} their breath cut a fiery swathe through the forests. In an attempt to protect his fellow elves, the soon-to-be hero [[Tethir (hero)|Tethir]] sacrificed himself to slay two ancient [[red dragon]]s. This act created the first elven dragonslayer and earned the elves the grudging respect of the dragons. The northern edge of Keltormir was renamed the [[Forest of Tethir]] in his honour..

Giants and [[human]]s settled the areas where dragonfire and giant woodcutters had cleared the forest. This prevented the elves from restoring their trees. Three millenia of dragon attacks, plagues and wars followed, the end result being Keltormir splitting into 3 separate realms, though they still remained in contact with each other.

During the [[Crown Wars|second Crown War]] Keltormir participated in the [[Sable Wars]] in {{Yearlink|-11450}}, aiding [[Eiell没r]] and [[Thearnytaar]] with [[Shantel Othreier]]. Together these nations attempted to invade [[Ilythiir]], aiming to reform or conquer the [[dark elves]] before they destroyed any more realms. Over half their forces were wiped out by the dark elves' corrupt magic. The Ilythiiri in turn destroyed Eiell没r and Thearnytaar, ending the Second Crown War in {{Yearlink|-11200}}, and began skirmishing along the borders of Keltormir.

Ilythiir initiated the Fourth Crown War in {{Yearlink|-10450}}, attacking other elvish nations in response to the [[Dark Disaster]] inflicted on [[Miyeritar]]. By {{Yearlink|-10300}} Keltormir had withdrawn its forces west, holding a defensive line at [[Highlands' Edge]], because of being pinned between the forces of [[Aryvandaar]] and [[Ilythiir]].
